org.openlcb.hub

Class Hub

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.hub.Hub

  • public class Hub
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple multi-threaded OpenLCB hub implementation.

    Multiple connections send lines terminated by newline, each of which is echoed to all other connections.

    main() directly invokes an object of the class.

    Current threading model does all the sending from a a single thread. If this is observed to back up & halt all flow, individual transmit queues and threads may be needed.

    Author:
    Bob Jacobsen Copyright 2012
